channel.title: The Masked Farter on skb.io
channel.description: Recent content in The Masked Farter on skb.io

item.title: macOS Folder Actions - Dismiss Notifications
item.description: Context # I recently switched to a CircuitPython-powered keyboard. The upside is that CircuitPython exposes a virtual removable drive that contains the code (code.py) that will execute on the device. In the case of the keyboard this involves setting up the keymaps, backlight, and some other more experimental features and settings.

item.title: Xpenology DSM 6.1.x on VMware ESXi 7
item.description: Goals # To build a virtual DSM machine starting with just the synoboot.img. VMware Steps # Steps to create a VM with the hardware necessary to boot Jun’s synoboot image
